ygData.subject: FINALLY FIREWATER
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I just got an email from Matt Yaney, he does trade skills, I think. I had emailed him before about firewater, which he said was in the game and in the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I just got an email from Matt Yaney, he does
trade skills, I think. I had emailed him before
about firewater, which he said was in the game and
in the Books. So I thought I'm crazy, but I checked
and rechecked. Nada. He still says it's in there
but did tell me what Firewater is made from.


So, spoiler gap and then I'll tell you























Combine Flask Of Water + Gnomish Spirits (where
you get this? I'm guessing in the Bar in Ak'Anon)

Please someone tell me I just missed this in the
two books I have on Tinkering. Because I'm
leaning towards thinking it's NOT in fact in the books. Someone test it, I'm at work and can't. :)


-Zikkin
